summary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Friday 8 October to end of Friday 8 October GMT
description: Friday is forecast to be mostly cloudy with some sunny intervals later.<br/><br/>A light southerly breeze becoming easterly with an airflow initially from the Atlantic and later from the North Sea having passed over the near continent. <br/><br/>A brief increase in particulate pollution due to local emissions may occur early in the day with calmer conditions as the wind direction changes, this should disperse again as a breeze picks up. Also a later air feed via the near continent may introduce some particulate pollution and levels may begin to build later on Friday evening.<br/><br/>Overall air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates<br/>Sulphur Dioxide
disclaimerText: This is for learning purpose and does not reflect real data source. See https://next.github.com/projects/flat-data for Flat Data Info
